column1: Name:Traffic Density- Annual Vehicle Miles Traveled
column3: How Calculated:The average number of vehicles traveling on a road segment on any given day during the year was estimated for each segment in a geography. The number of vehicles was multiplied by length of road segment to arrive at a daily vehicle-miles measure for that segment. The daily vehicle-miles measures were summed across all segments in a geography and then multiplied by 365 to arrive at an annual measure. Vehicle-miles are expressed in millions per square kilometer.

column1: NYC Department of Health and Mental Hygiene
More information can be found at: http://nyc.gov/health/tracking
